description: Move in next February! Hartley is a collection of brand new 1 to 2 bed + den condos in the heart of Surrey City Centre, located minutes from parks and rapid transit. Developed by Porte Homes who has a solid reputation in metro Vancouver with over 57 years of experience. Interior designed by Portico with two color schemes. This Jr. 3 bedroom 3 bathroom home features a modern kitchen with quartz counters, full size S/S appliances, great size bedrooms and a large patio facing East with lots of natural sunlight. Includes 2 parking stall, 1 bike locker and access to a fully equipped amenity centre with club house, gym, sauna, common courtyard and more. Visit presentation centre on site weekends 12-5pm and weekdays by appointment.
